sentences.en: Conclusion: The dissolution of indapamide capsules are coincidence with requirement.
sentences.cn: 结论: 所研制的吲达帕胺胶囊溶出度符合要求.

sentences.en: Corrosion reactions , with metal dissolution , can occur in both basic and acidic solutions.
sentences.cn: 使金属溶解的腐蚀反应, 可以在碱性也可以在酸性溶液中发生.

sentences.en: Dissolution and detachment of these cells create epithelial erosions that characterize the disease.
sentences.cn: 这些细胞的溶解和分离,产生恶性卡他热特征的上皮糜烂.

sentences.en: Dissolution of the metal may occur.
He stayed on until the dissolution of the firm in 1948.
sentences.cn: 他一直呆到1948年公司解散。

sentences.en: Methods: By adding dissolution enhance to make test solution to be homogeneous.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用加入增溶剂,使供试液成为均匀的乳化状态.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To establish a method to determine the dissolution of Aciclovir tablet.
sentences.cn: 目的建立阿昔洛韦片的溶出度检查方法.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To establish the dissolution method for nateglinide tablets.
sentences.cn: 目的:建立那格列奈片的体外溶出度的测定方法.

sentences.en: Objective To establish the method to determine dissolution of rifaximin capsules.
sentences.cn: 目的建立利福昔明胶囊溶出度的测定方法.

sentences.en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentences.cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

sentences.en: Results Uniformity, content, standard amount, dissolution were up to the standard.
sentences.cn: 结果均匀度 、 含量 、 标示量 、 溶出度等各项检验项目均合格.

sentences.en: The adjustment in staffing after dissolution or merger of the institution.
sentences.cn: (三)撤销或者合并机构后编制的调整.

sentences.en: The churches consociated to fight their dissolution.
sentences.cn: 教会联合起来对付他们的分裂行动.

sentences.en: the dissolution of barriers of class and race
sentences.cn: 阶级和种族隔阂的消除

sentences.en: The president announced the dissolution of the National Assembly.
sentences.cn: 总统宣布解散国民议会。

sentences.en: These verbs all refer to gradual change resulting in destruction or dissolution.
sentences.cn: 这些动词都表示导致毁灭或分解的逐步变化.

words.tran_cn: 可分解的；可溶解的；可解除的
可溶解的；可分解的；可解散的
使溶解；使溶化（dissolve的过去分词）
分解，[化学]溶解；（议会等的）解散；（契约等的）解除；死亡

trans.tran_cn: 溶解，融化，（社团等）解散，<律> 离婚，腐朽，崩溃
trans.tran_en: the act of breaking up an organization, institution etc so that it no longer exists
